column1: '''Paksu''' was a minor character in [[The Father Christmas Letters]]. He was a polar bear cub who lived at the North Pole. He and his brother [[Valkotukka]] were nephews of the [[North Polar Bear]].
Paksu and Valkotukka came to [[Father Christmas]]' house for a visit. They ended up never leaving.

column3: was mischievous. Father Christmas wrote of them that "they seem to be growing up just like their uncle."
